summary: This is an email chain among legal counsel regarding the case US v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr 330 (AJN)). It forwards a court order requiring a response by November 12, 2021, and discusses scheduling a call ahead of a final pretrial conference. The email includes contact information for defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: Attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, sending a courtesy copy of a court filing and providing updated contact information.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on the email chain among Maxwell's legal team.

persons.context: Listed as a recipient on the email chain among Maxwell's legal team.

events.title: Court Order Issued in Maxwell Case
events.description: The court issued an order requiring the defense to respond by November 12, 2021, at 12 pm.

events.title: Final Pretrial Conference Scheduled
events.description: A final pretrial conference is scheduled for 11 a.m. on Monday, November 1, 2021, where the issue from the court order is anticipated to be addressed.

keyFacts: The court issued an order in US v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr 330 (AJN)) on October 29, 2021, requiring a response by November 12, 2021.
Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim provided her new office address and preferred email contact information.
A final pretrial conference was scheduled for November 1, 2021, to address the court's order.
The email chain shows coordination among Maxwell's defense attorneys: Bobbi C. Sternheim, Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
